import React from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { getCartTotal } from "../features/CartSlice"; const CartPage = () => { const { cart, totalQuantity, totalPrice } = useSelector( (state) => state.allCart ); const dispatch = useDispatch(); dispatch(getCartTotal()); return (
Cart - 2 items
{cart.map((data) => (

{data.title}

${data.price}

))}
Summary
  • Total Quantity {totalQuantity}
  • Total amount
    ${totalPrice}
); }; export default CartPage;
